title: #107: Frenchie le Poo-Poo (Mike Ward @MikeWardCA)
itunes:title: Frenchie le Poo-Poo with Mike Ward
description: Mike Ward came to my hotel room while I was in Montreal to talk to me about his amazing journey of learning to do his standup in a 2nd language. He's got about as much to say as I can imagine anyone saying about French comedians.
content:encoded: Mike Ward came to my hotel room while I was in Montreal to talk to me about his amazing journey of learning to do his standup in a 2nd language. He's got about as much to say as I can imagine anyone saying about French comedians.
itunes:subtitle: Mike Ward came to my hotel room while I was in Montreal to talk to me about his amazing journey of learning to do his standup in a 2nd language. He's got about as much to say as I can imagine anyone saying about French comedians.
itunes:author: Ari Shaffir
